originalText.text: I have been been doing business with them since 2019 but the company I work for has been working with them for much longer. There are multiple reasons we stay doing business. My contact with them is always great. Communication is second to none. Their prices are always fair and competitive. Whenever prices go up or down, they show that integrity is most important for them. I would recommend anyone to use them for their pallet business if asked.

originalText.text: Our company has been using the pallets from this company for many years. Not only are they of good quality and reasonably priced, but the delivery is also quite timely. During the pandemic, many other suppliers increased their prices or were unable to supply pallets. However, this company consistently supported us with their integrity in business.

text.text: Our company has been using the pallets from this company for many years. Not only are they of good quality and reasonably priced, but the delivery is also quite timely. During the pandemic, many other suppliers increased their prices or were unable to supply pallets. However, this company consistently supported us with their integrity in business.

originalText.text: Ordering pallets from here since 2021 and it has been good. Fare price, reliable and accommodating all urgent orders.

text.text: Ordering pallets from here since 2021 and it has been good. Fare price, reliable and accommodating all urgent orders.

originalText.text: The owner Ibrahim came to our office complaining that the pallets were not stacked properly and that there were more pallets on the floor than originally discussed. (Which was at the time understood). He then proceed to get heated because we were not catering to him right away and got in his truck and drove away right as we started to load his truck.  After we called him asking why he left, he said, "we could do business together possibly, but I was not given the right attention".  I would avoid at all costs, plenty of other guys out there that do the same.

originalText.text:
Asked for pricing & couldn’t get a clear answer. Person decided to answer another call instead of answering my questions since I have 100 pallets 40x48 that I would like to drop off.

GUESS YOU LOST $11 profit  per pallet on 100 used pallets drop off.
